name: interior-design
description: A interior designing website for our internship project.

scripts.prestart: cls && echo Installing Dependencies... && npm install
scripts.start: cls && echo Pruning devDependencies... && npm prune --production
scripts.poststart: cls && set NODE_ENV=production && set PORT=80 && node src/index.js
scripts.pretest: cls && echo Installing Dependencies... && npm install
scripts.test: cls && set NODE_ENV=development && set PORT=80 && nodemon src/index.js

author: WB06B6 Team
